attributes.action: look at the affects of spa regulations concerning new building projects near heathland in the south east ,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Potential new developments are being held up or stopped compleatly by some small birds that nest in the springtime on the heaths, Preditors that kill or eat small birds/eggs are there already there badgers,hedgehogs,weasels,grassnakes,rats,crows etc,so a few roaming cats or dogs from new houses will not affect the birds nesting.
